mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_user
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paper_code = #{paper_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_code = #{course_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seq_no = #{seq_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
paper_name = #{paper_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paper_desc = #{paper_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
multi_media_info = #{multi_media_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_exam = #{time_exam,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_re_exam = #{is_re_exam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
times_re_exam = #{times_re_exam,jdbcType=BIGINT},
def_per_score = #{def_per_score,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rule_sort_question = #{rule_sort_question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_sort_answer = #{rule_sort_answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feedback_type = #{feedback_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expect_fixed = #{expect_fixed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
delstatus = #{delstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorid = #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorname = #{creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorcode = #{creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatoridpath = #{creatoridpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatornamepath = #{creatornamepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorcodepath = #{creatorcodepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ext0 = #{ext0,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE tb_user
id = #{domain.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paper_code = #{domain.paper_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_code = #{domain.course_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seq_no = #{domain.seq_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},

times_re_exam = #{domain.times_re_exam,jdbcType=BIGINT},
def_per_score = #{domain.def_per_score,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rule_sort_question = #{domain.rule_sort_question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_sort_answer = #{domain.rule_sort_answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feedback_type = #{domain.feedback_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expect_fixed = #{domain.expect_fixed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
delstatus = #{domain.delstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorid = #{domain.creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorname = #{domain.creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatorcode = #{domain.creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

creatorcodepath = #{domain.creatorcodepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{domain.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

${wc.condition}
